SELECT DATE_FORMAT(od.order_date, '%Y-%m') as order_month, SUM(od.order_tot_price) as total_order_tot_price, SUM(pd.product_unit_price * odt.order_dt_amt) as total_product_unit_price, (SUM(od.order_tot_price) - SUM(pd.product_unit_price * odt.order_dt_amt)) as net_profit FROM tb_order od INNER JOIN tb_order_dt odt ON od.order_no = odt.order_no INNER JOIN tb_product pd ON odt.product_no = pd.product_no
WHERE od.order_date >= DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{order_date}, '%Y-%m'), '%Y-%m-01') AND od.order_date = LAST_DAY(STR_TO_DATE(#{order_date}, '%Y-%m'))
